name: Quality Manual Precedence and Versioning
description: Checks precedence between quality manual versions and local work instructions

theory.natural_language: Quality Manual v2 supersedes v1. Local work instructions must align with the current quality manual. When a conflict exists, the manual takes precedence. The safety addendum remains valid across versions. Team Alpha still references v1 in an old checklist.

queries.natural_language: If a local work instruction contradicts Quality Manual v2, which should be followed?

expected_answer.natural_language: Follow Quality Manual v2; the manual takes precedence over conflicting local work instructions.
expected_answer.explanation: manual_precedence OVER local_work_instruction ∧ current_quality_manual IS QualityManual_v2

queries.natural_language: Is Team Alpha compliant if they still cite v1?

expected_answer.natural_language: No. v2 supersedes v1, so using v1 in the checklist is non-compliant.
expected_answer.explanation: QualityManual_v2 SUPERSEDES QualityManual_v1 ∧ checklist uses v1

queries.natural_language: Does the safety addendum remain valid after the version change?

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes. The safety addendum is valid across versions.
